item.description:
Please join me and friends at anytime for late afternoon of fun and easy exercise, or just come to watch. Wimp Volleyball on a sand court is a noncompetitive game. Totally for the fun of moving around trying to hit and return the ball. We will be following the rules and keeping scoe. Having fun and learning will be more important than winning. We work on trying to keeping the volley going, rather than trying to end the volley. So, bring your friends and teens, your drinks to keep cool and hydrated and insect repellent.

Don’t want to play but want to spend the day cheering us on?   Just bring a lawn chair and join us on the sideline.    I hope to see you there!

 

Location:   Merrifield Park, Ferry St. Hudson, NH 03051

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Wimp Volleyball
